name: Parkour Master (Ellisjames20061)
description:
Parkour master is a 3d fast paced speed running platformer. Your job is to complete the level in the quickest time as possible. Optimise your time by finding a way of navigating that works best for you or even your own techniques.

If you want to reset your run leave with Q and restart

Many thanks to emerald Milan for the game game idea. The game was made in my spare time and is my first attempt at a 3d project. Any ideas to further improve this game? Post them below and you might see your ideas in the next update
